thread.title: Exclusive: Amazon to cut back on indie films: sources

title: Exclusive: Amazon to cut back on indie films: sources
text:
Exclusive: Amazon to cut back on indie films: sources 11:04am GMT - 02:08 
Amazon.com's movie studio plans to scale back its work on indie films as it puts resources into more lucrative commercial projects, people familiar with the matter told Reuters. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Amazon.com's movie studio plans to scale back its work on indie films as it puts resources into more lucrative commercial projects, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
